Use a db: \c dbname (in psql) For schemas (a similar feature): set search_path = schema_name;
Create table: create table tbname (field1 value_type1  field2 value_type2  ... );
create table tbname (field1 value_type1  field2 value_type2  ... )

Create database: show all data in all fields
Delete database: show all data in some fields
List databases: show filtered data in all fields
